title: What are the Outer Techniques of Fascination and how can they improve your interpersonal skills?
first_phrase: In this concluding section, Dr. Marco Paret, director of ISI-CNV, presents additional outer and inner techniques to enhance interpersonal skills and abilities. These include energy training, breathing, hand movements, gaze patterns, and practical applications. Paret encourages readers to practice these exercises with a friend and provides his contact information if further explanation is needed. It concludes his practical introduction to the techniques of fascination, which he presents as a means of diffusing advanced techniques of hypnosis and magnetism.
content: Therefore, if you want to proceed further or you wish to receive more explanation on some of them, I will be more than happy to help you with ideas and hints. Please write me at paret@neurolinguistic.com or visit our site http://www.mesmerismus.info. Author Resource:- Dr. Marco Paret is the director of ISI-CNV, an international Institute whose goal is to diffuse advanced techniques of hypnosis and magnetism. His main sites are http://www.mesmerismus.info and http://www.neurolinguistic.com.
last_phrase: Thank you for taking the time to read this. If you have any further questions or would like more information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me via email or by visiting our website. I am always available to provide guidance and support in the field of hypnosis and magnetism.
